mapper.select: SELECT A.DEVICESEQ as deviceSeq, E.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYINTERVAL as busStopDetailCategoryInterval FROM DEVICE A INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS B ON B.DEVICESEQ = A.DEVICESEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INFO C ON B.BUSINFOSEQ = C.BUSINFOSEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INTERVAL D ON C.BUSINFOSEQ = D.BUSINFOSEQ INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY E ON D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = E.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ WHERE A.DEVICEMODEL=#{deviceId};
